name: rejuvenating
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
rejuvenate
to make someone look or feel young and energetic again: She felt rejuvenated by her fortnight in the Bahamas.
to make an organization or system more effective by introducing new methods, ideas, or people: He has decided to rejuvenate the team by bringing in a lot of new, young players.
